螺旋飞跃时，对周围的敌人造成自身攻击256.0%的风属性伤害。: When performing a Helix Leap, deals Anemo Damage equal to 256.0% of ATK to nearby enemies.
在空中消灭敌人后，重置自身滞空跳跃次数，最多重置6.0次。: After defeating an enemy in mid-air, reset the character's air jump count, up to a maximum of 6.0 times.
从高处落地时，对周围的敌人造成自身攻击128.0%的震荡伤害。: Upon landing from a height, deals Smash Damage equal to 128.0% of ATK to nearby enemies.
在空中时，受到的伤害降低10.0%。: While taking damage in mid-air, the damage taken is reduced by 10.0%.
受到致命伤害时，使自身不被击败，生命值下降为1。每300.0秒最多触发1次。: Survives Fatal damage, reducing the character's HP to 1. This effect can only be triggered once every 300.0s max.
受到伤害时，有-50.0%概率使其降低20.0%。: When taking damage, there is a -50.0% chance to reduce the damage taken by 20.0%.
释放终结技时，对周围10米内的队友提供目标最大生命3.0%的治疗。每5.0秒最多: When using an Ultimate Skill, restores HP equal to 3.0% of max HP to teammates within a 10-metre range. This effect can only be triggered once every 5.0s.
受到伤害时不会产生僵直，但是自身造成的伤害降低15.0%（独立）。: Gains immunity to Hitstun, but Damage Dealt is reduced by 15.0% (unaffected by other Demon Wedges).
闪避时，对起点周围的敌人造成自身攻击256.0%的火属性伤害。: When performing a Dodge, deals Pyro Damage equal to 256.0% of ATK to enemies near the starting point.
通过攻击获得连击点数时，有1.0%概率额外获得1点。: When gaining Combo Point through attacking, there is a 1.0% chance to gain 1 additional Combo Point.
根据连击等级提高暴击率，每连击等级提高20.0%。: Each Combo Level increases CRIT Chance by 20.0%.
根据连击等级提高触发概率，每连击等级提高16.0%。: Each Combo Level increases Trigger Probability by 16.0%.
击败敌人后，在目标位置引发一次爆炸，对0.0米范围内的敌人造成远程武器攻击0.0: Triggers an explosion at the target location upon defeating an enemy, dealing 0.0% of your Ranged Weapon damage to enemies within a 0.0-metre range.
伤害暴击后，获得1层触发概率提高30.0%，持续5.0秒，最多叠加5.0层。: When dealing CRIT damage, gains 1 stack that increases Trigger Probability by 30.0% for 5.0s, up to 5.0 stacks.
伤害暴击后，有100.0%概率将目标缴械。: When dealing CRIT Damage, there is a 100.0% chance to disarm the target.
When triggering Bonus Effect, gains 1 stack that increases Multishot by 10.0% for 10.0s, up to 5.0 stacks.
伤害触发额外效果后，30.0%概率回复1枚弹药。: Upon triggering Bonus Effects, there is a 30.0% chance to reload 1 bullet.
受到的伤害降低12.0%。消灭敌人时，获得1层攻击提高6.0%，持续30.0秒，: Decreases Damage Taken by 12.0%. Defeating an enemy grants 1 stack that increases ATK by 6.0% for 30.0s, up to 15.0 stacks. This effect duration refreshes with each new stack gained.
委托和梦魇残声战斗开始时，获得技能威力提高54.0%，持续30.0秒。: Increases Skill Damage by 54.0% for 30.0s when battle starts during commissions or Nocturnal Echoes.
周围20米内不超过2名敌人时，造成的伤害提高24.0%。: Increases Damage Dealt by 24.0% when facing less than 2 enemies within a 20-metre range.

技能伤害降低50.0%，使用武器进行攻击时造成0.2%同属性追加伤害。: Skill Damage -50.0%. When attacking with a weapon, deals 0.2% additional damage of the same element type.

强化至+5.0后，此魔之楔可同时重复装备多个。: Once upgraded to +5.0, this Demon Wedge can be equipped in multiples.
仅当装备<Polarity>D</>趋向的魔之楔大于等于4个时，属性效果生效。: The element effect activates only when at least 4 Demon Wedges aligned to Track <Polarity>D</> are equipped.

仅当装备<Polarity>O</>趋向的魔之楔大于等于4个时，属性效果生效。: The element effect activates only when at least 4 Demon Wedges aligned to Track <Polarity>O</> are equipped.

改变单手剑的普通攻击招式和威力。对比默认招式，综合威力提高100%。: Upgrades Sword Normal Attack to deal double the damage of the standard attack.
改变单手剑的蓄力招式和威力。对比默认招式，综合威力提高100%。: Upgrades Sword Charged Attack to deal double the damage of the standard attack.
改变单手剑的蓄力招式和威力。蓄力攻击扔出一把雷剑，延时后造成大范围爆炸伤害。对比: Upgrades Sword Charged Attack to hurl a thunderblade that explodes after a short delay, damaging enemies in a large AoE. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
改变长柄的蓄力攻击招式和威力，蓄力攻击可向前掷出5柄武器，攻击沿途的敌人。对比默: Upgrades the Polearm Charged Attack to throw 5 polearms forward, attacking enemies in your path for double the damage of the standard attack.
改变长柄的下落攻击招式和威力，下落攻击可额外造成一次更大范围的攻击。对比默认招式: Upgrades the Polearm Plunging Attack to trigger a bigger shockwave on impact, dealing double the damage of the standard attack.
改变长柄的普通攻击招式和威力。召唤枪影攻击。对比默认招式，综合威力提高100%。: Upgrades Polearm Normal Attack to summon phantom spears that strike the target. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
改变长柄的蓄力攻击招式和威力，蓄力攻击可向前冲刺，攻击沿途的敌人。对比默认招式，: Upgrades Polearm Charged Attack to launch a forward dash, damaging enemies in the user's path for double the damage of the standard attack.
改变重剑的普通攻击招式和威力，普通攻击的最后一击可创造3道剑气，攻击沿途的敌人。: Upgrades the Greatsword Normal Attack to unleash 3 Swordwaves upon final hit, cleaving through enemies in your path for double the damage of the standard attack.
改变重剑的蓄力攻击招式和威力，蓄力过程中可移动，并抓取沿途的可被控怪物，最多抓取: Upgrades the Greatsword Charged Attack to allow movement during charging while capturing controllable monsters along the path (up to 4). Spending combos extends the charging window, culminating in a powerful AoE attack upon release or timeout that deals double the damage of the standard attack.
改变重剑的普通攻击招式和威力。召唤齿轮连续攻击。对比默认招式，综合威力提高100: Upgrades Greatsword Normal Attack to summon rotating gears that unleash a flurry of strikes. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
改变双刀的滑铲攻击招式和威力，向前冲刺并对沿途的所有敌人造成伤害。对比默认招式，: Upgrades the Dual Blades Sliding Attack into a lethal dash, slashing through all enemies in your path for double the damage of the standard attack.
改变双刀的普通攻击招式和威力。将双刀组合后进行回旋攻击。对比默认招式，综合威力提: Upgrades Dual Blades Normal Attack to combine the blades into a returning throw. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
改变双刀的蓄力攻击招式和威力。将双刀组合后扔出，对路径上的敌人造成伤害。对比默认: Upgrades Dual Blades Charged Attack to combine the blades and hurl them forward, damaging enemies in their path. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
改变太刀的蓄力攻击招式和威力，命中敌人后，自身会跃起并进行下劈，对周围的敌人造成: Upgrades the Katana Charged Attack. Upon striking an enemy, the character leaps into the air and slams down, dealing multiple hits to surrounding foes for double the damage of the standard attack.
